name: Stranded on Snake Island
description:
This is my submission for Curdle Jam April 2020.

I spent most of the time working out the mechanics and didn't get too far into development, but it was still a fun time and I will probably continue to work on this game and improve it!

CONTROLS-

Left Mouse Click on which character you want to play as.

WASD to walk around

SPACEBAR picks up sticks and berries. You can only hold one of each.

//Side Note

There's not much gameplay here but you get the concept! I had planned to make the characters rely on berries and the heat of the fire to keep them alive, while avoiding being bitten by snakes (which would cause venom poisoning and kill them).

I have a lot of other ideas for this still, so keep an eye on this if you like the prototype, I may update it.
